reviewText: This is a good movie about St. Teresa, i enjoyed it and will be a movie I will watch often. I have read St. Teresa's Biography and I wished the film had special effects to show the miracles that she experienced, but overall the film was enjoyable.

If you are fluent in Spanish the video itself might be fine -- HOWEVER, the trailers prior to getting to the story of this Christian saint begin with a film about lap dancing. The bits that follow are also rather explicit romatic stories -- all in Spanish.  It was not clear in the write-up on Amazon that this video is all Spanish.

Se relata la vida de "TERESA DE JESS", pasajes interesantes de su vida, su estancia en el convento de la Encarnacin, y finalmente el momento de la fundacin de las "Carmelitas Descalzas".
Un DVD interesante se los recomiendo!
If it is a movie with Aurora Bautista, it has to be good. So this one is
